function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Participants from different countries with varying levels of impact from covid-19","category":"Participants","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in remote work capabilities over survey rounds","category":"Remote Work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction professionals may have varied perceptions of the covid-19 impact on construction, leading to a lack of consensus in response planning.","category":"Construction Professionals","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global and regional differences in perceived impacts of covid-19 on construction may lead to localized response plans that do not account for broader patterns of disease propagation.","category":"Construction Industry","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perceptions of professionals at different points in time may not accurately reflect the evolving nature of the pandemic, leading to outdated response plans.","category":"Construction Professionals","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Financial strain on self-employed individuals due to lockdowns","category":"Financial Strain","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of the construction industry due to covid-19","category":"Construction Industry","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in immigrant workers impacting construction projects","category":"Construction Projects","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in perception of pandemic impact between developed and developing countries","category":"Perception of Pandemic Impact","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on construction professionals’ performance","category":"Construction Professionals","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction professionals interacting with covid-19","category":"Construction Professionals","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global contagion of covid-19 impacting construction professionals","category":"Construction Professionals","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflexivity in urban soundscapes research","category":"Urban Soundscapes Research","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited representation of diverse experiences in the podcast, particularly those of minority groups and marginalized voices.","category":"Representation in Podcast","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tightly controlled production environment may lead to a false sense of security and neglect of potential risks.","category":"Safety in Production","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of generalizability in qualitative research may restrict the applicability of insights to broader contexts and populations.","category":"Qualitative Research","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"International collaboration involving 25 academics creates potential for transmission of contagious diseases across borders.","category":"International Collaboration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Podcasting project involves close contact between academics, increasing the risk of transmitting contagious diseases within the academic community.","category":"Podcasting Project","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity and interaction between individuals in the streets","category":"Street Proximity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Attentiveness to non-human others and the more-than-human city","category":"City Environment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Familiarity with lockdown measures leading to complacency","category":"Lockdown Measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban soundscape linked to covid-19","category":"Urban Soundscape","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in suburban streets due to increased pedestrian, jogger, and cyclist activity","category":"Social Distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowdfunding and volunteer delivery services increasing physical interaction and potential exposure to the virus","category":"Delivery Services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and consideration for front-line workers in essential businesses","category":"Front-line Workers","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent references to the visceral experience of being in the city under covid-19.","category":"City Experience","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"People hoarding essential supplies such as toilet paper","category":"Hoarding","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to gather in public spaces leading to new ways of social interaction","category":"Social Interaction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of representation of embodied sounds and communication in scholarly journals","category":"Scholarly Journals","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Marginalized people being more physically visible and exposed in cities during the pandemic","category":"Marginalized People","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on media for information about the pandemic","category":"Media Reliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable access to technology and education impacting ability to understand and share experiences during the pandemic","category":"Access to Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in urban soundscape due to covid-19","category":"Urban Soundscape","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of urban soundscape as a reduction in the sounds of capitalism","category":"Urban Soundscape","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Change in urban soundscape due to social distancing and lockdown measures.","category":"Urban Soundscape","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in city soundscape due to covid-19 containment measures","category":"City Soundscape","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of people in the city due to containment measures","category":"City Absence","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Structural and political questions arising from the quietness of the city","category":"City Quietness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stereotypical representations of city sounds and environments","category":"City Representations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of covid-19 on global north and south","category":"Global Impact","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality and positionality in urban environments","category":"Urban Inequality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Struggles to make sense of experience under covid-19 in cities","category":"Covid-19 Experience","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of contagious diseases like covid-19 in cities","category":"Global Spread","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rates of anxiety and depression during quarantines","category":"Mental Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on digital health practices","category":"Digital Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial interventions leading to economic instability and inequality","category":"Financial Instability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of timely and accurate information leading to misinformation and panic","category":"Misinformation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dynamic and evolving situation of covid-19","category":"Evolving Situation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misrepresentation in financial research","category":"Financial Research","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of the novel coronavirus","category":"Viral Spread","confidence":"High"}]}
